item.title: Bitcoin Spot ETF saw a total net inflow of 226.61M USD yesterday, with none of the twelve ETFs experiencing a net outflowAccording to SoSoValue data, Bitcoin spot ETF saw a total net inflow of 226.61M USD yesterday (Eastern Time, July 24th).The Bitcoin Spot ETF with the highest net inflow yesterday was Fidelity's ETF FBTC, with a daily net inflow of 106.58M USD, and the total historical net inflow of FBTC currently stands at 12.43B USD.The second highest was VanEck's ETF HODL, with a daily net inflow of 46.36M USD, and the total historical net inflow of HODL currently stands at 1.12B USD.As of the time of publication, the total net asset value of Bitcoin Spot ETFs is 154.45B USD, with an ETF net asset ratio (market capitalization relative to the total Bitcoin market cap) of 6.54%. The historical cumulative net inflow has reached 54.69B USD.Source: https://sosovalue.com/zh/assets/etf/us-btc-spot

item.title: South Korea's KB Kookmin Bank Applies for Trademarks Related to USD and JPY StablecoinsAccording to the Korea Economic Daily, KB Kookmin Bank recently applied for 27 trademarks related to USD and JPY stablecoins, including "KBUSD" and "JPYKB," for a total of 49 trademark rights, covering categories such as stablecoin electronic financial platform software. Previously, KB Kookmin Bank applied for trademarks related to KRW stablecoins last month, and its current layout has expanded to the USD and JPY fields, intending to seize the trademark rights for foreign currency stablecoins. [Wu Blockchain]

item.title: Binance Completes Horizen (ZEN) Contract SwapAccording to the official announcement, Binance has now completed the Horizen (ZEN) contract swap and opened the deposit and withdrawal services for the new ZEN (Base) token. The tokens have been swapped at a ratio of 1 old ZEN = 1 new ZEN. Deposits and withdrawals of ZEN tokens on the Horizen (ZEN) network will no longer be supported. [ChainCatcher]

item.title: Caixin: Qian Fenglei's Wealth Management Products Closed and RefundedQian Fenglei and Fofund, a wealth management product platform under several companies under his actual control, including Hengfeng International, issued a service change notice to investors on July 23, 2025. Fofund, as the fund manager, announced the closure and refund of the fund wealth management products "Duo Duo No. 1" and "Duo Duo No. 2". Reports against Qian Fenglei and Hengfeng International have been accepted by the Hong Kong Securities and Futures Commission and the Market Surveillance Division of the Hong Kong Stock Exchange. [Caixin Report]

item.title: SlowMist Chief Information Security Officer: Speculation that WOO X may have an unauthorized access vulnerability due to API permission control issuesSlowMist Chief Information Security Officer 23pds tweeted that WOO X underwent an API v3 upgrade on June 30th, and he speculates that the vulnerability was caused by an authorization issue due to API permission control problems. The reasons are as follows: multiple withdrawals were made, and 9 malicious users can be clearly identified. "So it is highly likely that the vulnerability was caused by a mix of old and new APIs, permission control, or logical issues, which was then maliciously exploited." [Foresight News]

item.title: South Korean Police Arrest 60-Year-Old Suspect in ₩84.00B Ponzi Scheme While on ProbationAccording to Yonhap News Agency, the Anti-Corruption and Economic Crime Investigation Unit of the Gyeonggi Southern Provincial Police Agency in South Korea announced on the 25th that they have arrested a 60-year-old suspect, Mr. A, on suspicion of running an 84.00 billion KRW Ponzi scheme during his probation period, and transferred six accomplices to the prosecution. From October 2020 to January 2022, Mr. A and others held project presentations on AI, cryptocurrencies, and other topics in Gangnam-gu, Seoul, and attracted more than 2,200 investors with the promise of "300% returns on investment," defrauding them of 84.00 billion KRW. They used funds from new investors to pay "dividends" to early investors, perpetrating the scheme. This individual was previously sentenced to eight months in prison with a two-year suspended sentence for fraud in July 2021. Police remind the public to be especially vigilant about investment projects claiming high returns, especially those involving AI or cryptocurrencies, to avoid falling into Ponzi schemes. [ChainCatcher]

item.title: WOO X: Vulnerability stemmed from a team member's device being targeted by a phishing attack, allowing the attacker to access the development environmentWOO X tweeted that the vulnerability in the attack stemmed from a phishing attack that compromised a team member's device, allowing the attacker to access the development environment. Although the team took several security measures to limit access, the attacker still had time to make a series of withdrawals. The team is currently conducting a full review and prioritizing reopening withdrawal functionality for all users. The team will update on progress once the review is complete. [Foresight News]

item.title: Hotcoin Exchange is about to launch LMEOW, ASP, and LN spot trading and SLP contract trading.On July 25, according to official news, Hotcoin will launch the following trading pairs on July 25: Spot trading pairs LMEOW/USDT (July 25 12:00 UTC+8): $LMEOW is the native token of the LMEOW project. ASP/USDT (July 25 12:00 UTC+8): $ASP is the native token of the Aspecta project. Aspecta fills a fundamental gap in capital markets: early-stage or locked assets often enter the public market without transparent pricing, creating volatility and distrust. LN/USDT (July 25 18:20 UTC+8): $LN is the native token of the LNFI Network project. Lnfi Network unlocks multi-asset DeFi on the Lightning Network through next-generation financial infrastructure, enabling users to trade, earn, and manage Bitcoin, Taproot assets, and RGB assets through LightningFi. Contract trading pairs SLP/USDT (July 25 12:00 UTC+8): $SLP is a contract transaction for the Smooth Love Potion project, with a maximum leverage of 25x. Play the Axie Infinity game to earn Smooth Love Potion (SLP) tokens. [Techflow]
